title: Interpretation of dreams about eating olives, the meaning of olives in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of eating black green olives for a pregnant woman. For a pregnant woman for a married woman to pick pressed olives. I dreamed that I was picking pressed olives by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream by Ibn Katheer. Olives in a dream is one of the dreams that we constantly see in a dream, and it is one of the beautiful dreams that carries many, many important signs and associations for every... A person, as olives are considered one of the beautiful vegetables present in our lives that many of us love, as oils and other important benefits are extracted for humans, in order to obtain good health. Then we review who he is in our article, the interpretation of seeing olives in a dream by the researcher and interpreter Ibn Sirin, the historical interpreter of dreams. Let's get the full interpretation. Interpretation of olives in a dream: A dream about olives is good news, and if you eat olives, many loyal friends will surround you. And if you are picking olives, there are many wonderful results at work. Seeing olive trees or olive trees is good, a blessing, and a blessing for the pioneer. If they are full of fruits, this is a sign of the expected pregnancy for the couple. If you plant its tree, then you are the owner of wisdom. To see yourself cutting its branches indicates extravagance and waste. Seeing olive leaves is good and righteous people and those who He saw that he is cleaning olives or stepping on them, this indicates exhaustion and hardship in his life. Seeing olives on the tree without picking them indicates reconciliation. Seeing picking olives from the ground indicates the presence of obstacles and obstacles at work. And whoever works in trade, seeing him is a good omen for him. Seeing yourself eating them often indicates family disputes. Interpretation Olives in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about eating olives by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees that he is eating olives, then money is given to the people of justice, and with them to the people of corruption. Olives in a dream are money and pleasure, and olives are a blessed person who benefits his family, and he is said to be an honorable woman or the son of a president or a state, and yellow olives In religion, whoever squeezes olives from the tree will receive blessings and goodness, and olives in a dream show the slaves that they have been beaten, and that the olives are beaten until they drop their load, and it is said that the olives are for the one who saw them. And whoever names the olive tree with oil, then he will marry a slave, and the same applies if the vine is watered with vinegar or dirt on the ground. The olive is money and contentment, and the olive is an honorable woman who will hold on to it more. Dealing with trust, appearing righteous or the best of people, and its fruit provides abundant sustenance and blessing with absolute pleasure. Whoever sees that he is cleaning olives or squeezing them, this indicates fatigue and suffering, and olives indicate the light of faith and guidance of sinners, reciting the Qur’an, restoring the broken, and money for. The poor. If you dream that you are picking olives with a group of good friends, this indicates success in work and trade and pleasant surprises for you. If you dream that you are taking olives from a jar, this predicts joy, happiness and good times. If you break a jar of olives, this predicts sadness, and they chase joy and happiness. If you dream that you are eating olives, it means that you will live contentedly and happily with loyal friends

If you dream that you are eating olives, it means that you will live contentedly and happily with loyal friends

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lion

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream. This interpretation follows many associations, and the lion is a young lion that shows strength and boldness most of the time, especially since his father is the king of the jungle and he is afraid of animals as well as humans. You may also be interested in knowing: Mirrors in a dream. We will discuss with you the opinion of Ibn Sirin. And other leading scholars and commentators, and we explain it in the lines of our article, follow us for more. Read also: Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream Interpretations of seeing a lion are as follows: Buying a young cub in a dream is interpreted in the event that a man and his wife indulge in pregnancy, as it is a sign of That the child is male. And if he thinks that he took the cub and the lion attacked him at that time, then this is a sign of a problem that the fortuneteller will face, and God knows best. In another interpretation, it was said that lions in a dream are a sign of the dreamer’s achievement and superiority in life. But if the young child is injured, then this dream It is a sign of a financial crisis or illness for the monarch. Many interpreters have said that the sign of a young boy in a dream is prosperity in trade and success in work. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a married woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a lion in a married woman’s dream if she cares for him and provides for him With food, as a sign that she takes care of her children and takes care of them. The cub that attacks the woman in the dream is an indication that there are some problems that she may face in her life. But you will be able to overcome it, because the cub is smaller than the lion, and these problems are also interpreted as cubs. Raising a child in a married woman’s dream is interpreted as being wise in the matters of her life and acting well, and God Almighty knows best. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of one dream for a lion. An unmarried woman’s dream in a dream when a young girl is chasing her is interpreted as follows: An unmarried woman feeds A lion in a dream is a sign of her diligence and bright future. This was the interpretation of the Nabulsi scholar who sees the little boy as a symbol of strength and courage for an unmarried woman. It was also said that it is good news for her that she will be linked to a strong and wise young man who will change her life for the better. But the young boy’s attack on the girl in the dream may It indicates crises and problems that a girl may face and she must be careful. Ibn Sirin praised that the lion is often a good sign for an unmarried girl and is linked to her relationships with people. You may also be interested in knowing: Salt in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant lion in a dream? Most commentators said that Seeing a lion in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will give birth to a boy. Scientists also agreed on this interpretation and it was one of their most prominent interpretations. It was also said that it is good news for the health that the woman and her baby will enjoy after birth, God willing. Al-Nabulsi stated that this dream describes this woman’s endurance in The troubles of pregnancy and that this fatigue will soon be replaced by comfort and goodness. If more than one child is seen in the dream, this may indicate that she will give birth to twins, and God knows best. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a lion for young people. He has interpreted the interpretation

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone trying to kill me with a bullet according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about someone trying to shoot me: A person finds many strange and unexpected things in his dream, such as seeing someone trying to kill him with bullets or any other weapon. This vision can lead a person to fear and heart contraction, so what are the interpretations related to that? For married and pregnant women? We explain this in our article.Interpretation of a dream about someone trying to kill me with a bullet in Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams about someone trying to shoot meSeeing someone trying to shoot himself represents many good and useful things for the dreamer and brings him happiness, while the dreamer may feel afraid of this dream, but the opposite is Generally correct. Some interpreters warn the person who sees this dream that he will go to buy some new things that will refresh and renew his life and may receive a certain amount of inheritance. It is possible that good things will be reflected in the dreamer’s life with this topic and he will get a new job that will bring him benefits and prosperity. But if someone chases you in your dream until he kills you, the vision will be interpreted as your mistakes and sins that you commit when you are awake and he will chase you to get you. One of the indications of the dreamer being chased in a dream to kill him is that he is exposed to a severe financial crisis for a long time, but by praying and continuing with it the crises will fade away from his life. Human.Interpretation of a dream about someone trying to kill me with a bullet in Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains in most of the interpretations related to shooting the dead that the topic is good news for the dreamer with many connotations. If the killing was done using a weapon, it is likely that there will be a joint business between the two people, such as entering into a trade together This vision in general indicates goodness, but Ibn Sirin shows something related to it, which is that if it is repeated in a person’s dream, there will be many disagreements around him and he will feel very sad as a result of his failure in certain matters. If the dreamer feels that someone is trying to kill him in a dream with a gun and hears the sound of bullets, then most experts predict unpleasant news that will change his life badly and affect him severely. If a person points a gun at himself to kill himself, it is possible that he will mistake himself or someone with someone and he will To think about the details of his life because he will witness serious changes in it. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of dreams of someone trying to shoot me for a single womanIf someone tries to shoot me An unmarried woman, but she resisted him and killed him, the vision expresses her imminent marriage in the event of her engagement or relationship in general. If she finds out that the person in charge of her at work or the manager is firing her, it is likely that he will give her a large financial compensation or get a promotion that will make her heart happy. If she sees She kills a person in a dream and he did not defend himself, then it is expected that there will be an attraction between them and this person wants to marry her. The gun and the murder have good signs in the vision as it shows her acceptance and admiration for the person who uses it as well as his attractive personality.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting arrows in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hitting arrows in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about hitting arrows in a dream, there is a large number of evidence and interpretations of dreams, and we find that scholars and diligent people in general are looking for interpretations, and those responsible for the site do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather they send the scholars’ interpretations Interpretation of a dream about hitting arrows in a dream: Archery arrows in a dream can indicate the strength of the dreamer and his good qualities. In the event that one sees that he is hitting arrows, this may indicate a lot of goodness that the dreamer will receive in his life during those days. It is possible Seeing arrows in a dream indicates positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period. Seeing arrows being thrown in a dream may indicate happiness and joys that come to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about being hit in the face with a shoe in a dream in the event of a collision Dreaming of being hit in the face with shoes, this may indicate harm that may happen to the dreamer in his workplace during this period. Hitting the face with a shoe in a dream may indicate some problems that the dreamer faces during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that a dream of being hit in the face with a shoe indicates To the fact that the dreamer has turned away from God, Blessed and Most High, and needs to repent and return to God Almighty. If someone saw that he was hitting his face with a shoe, then there are some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for an oppressor who hits the oppressed in a dream may indicate a strike. The oppressed against the oppressor indicates the abundant goodness that the dreamer will reap during this time. In the case of dreaming that the oppressor defeats the oppressed in a dream, this may indicate the distress that the dreamer will fall into during this period, and God knows best. Seeing the oppressor beating the oppressed in a dream may indicate problems The dreamer may suffer from it in his life during those days. Seeing the oppressor beating the oppressed in a dream may mean that the dreamer will be exposed to a big problem during this time and he must ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a student hitting his teacher in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that the student was beating The teacher may indicate corruption in life that the dreamer is carrying out and must stop. Beating the teacher in a dream may indicate a crisis that the dreamer fell into during this time, and God knows best. It is possible to see the student hitting the teacher in a dream, which indicates some pressure that he is facing. The dreamer during this time. Seeing the teacher knocking in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s need to get some advice to help you get through this stage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of giving a military salute in a dream: The military salute in a dream may indicate the psychological peace that the dreamer feels during Those days. If one sees himself giving a military salute, this may indicate the growth and development that is occurring in the life of the dreamer, thanks to God. Seeing a military salute in a dream may mean that the dreamer will enjoy a quiet life during this time. Interpretation of a vision

title: The symbol of Bisht in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Bisht in a dream: Bisht is the robe that Arabs wore in ancient times and gave them prestige and elegance that distinguished them from others. The connotations of seeing a bisht in a dream vary according to the color of the dreamer, whether male or female. The bisht and other symbols that we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article. Bisht in a dream Seeing a bisht in a dream symbolizes that God Almighty protects the dreamer from all evil because of his good morals, his assistance to people, his commitment to the teachings of his religion, and the performance of his duties in a timely manner. If an unmarried young man sees a bisht While he is sleeping, this is a sign of his future marriage, God Almighty willing, and the formation of a happy and stable family. If a married woman dreams of an elegant statue, this is a sign that she will become pregnant soon. In the event that a person works as an employee in reality and dreams of a shesht, this symbolizes that he will receive a special promotion in The coming period will bring him a lot of money. The beast in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If a man sees a Besht in a dream, this is a sign of a broad diet and an abundance of goodness that God grants in a short time, and a life of peace and happiness. When a woman dreams of a Besht, this indicates stable conditions. Which she is enjoying these days and the end of all the issues that are disturbing her life. Seeing a beautiful bisht during sleep symbolizes the protection of the Lord - the Almighty - and the ease of things and a feeling of happiness, love and contentment. If you buy a dark-colored bisht in a dream, this is a sign of widespread food and large amounts of money that you will obtain. She has a profitable trade. Bisht in a dream for single people. If a girl dreams of Bisht, this is a sign of her ability to achieve her goals and desires and to accompany her with good luck at every step. Seeing Bisht in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes her good morals, her kind heart, and her good relations with all the people around her. When a girl sees in a dream that a man is wearing a beautiful bisht and there is no long distance between them, this is a sign of the good relationship that unites them in reality, which will be strengthened over the days and will reach. The bond that will culminate in the wedding. If an unmarried girl is suffering from some pressure or facing problems in her life and dreams of someone wearing an elegant bisht coming, this proves that her pain will be relieved and her sorrows will be resolved with joy, God willing. Seeing an impure bisht in a girl’s dream indicates that she is going through a crisis. Difficult psychology these days and her need for attention and support. A bisht in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a bisht elegant and well-groomed, this is a sign of the good psychological state she is enjoying these days. If a woman sees a bisht made of leather in a dream, this indicates The stable relationship that she has with her husband and the extent of understanding, friendliness and respect between them. When a married woman dreams of someone wearing a bisht made of luxurious fabric, this is a sign of the prosperity and luxury that she enjoys at this time in her life. If a married woman sees during her sleep a man wearing a cut-off waistcoat, this symbolizes The state of anxiety that prevails these days and her fear that something will happen that will disturb her life. Bisht

title: Interpretation of a dream about gifts falling from the sky in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about gifts falling from the sky in a dream. If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about gifts falling from the sky in a dream, it is one of the disturbing dreams that the dreamer wants to know an explanation for, but he must be aware that these interpretations are interpretations of interpretation scholars and that the site managers are not affiliated with that. Be careful and do not completely believe these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about gifts falling from the sky in a dream: Gifts falling from the sky may indicate the goodness and blessing that the dreamer will receive during this time. Anyone who dreams that gifts are falling from the sky can indicate the near relief and getting out of... The problems that the dreamer was facing in his life during those days. If one sees the gift falling from the sky, this may indicate freedom from debts and financial crises. Seeing gifts falling from the sky in a dream may indicate the end of the financial crisis that the owner was suffering at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about severe hair loss when touched in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that his hair is falling out a lot can indicate a financial loss that the dreamer may suffer during this period. A dream about hair loss when touched in a dream can indicate a loss of effort. What the dreamer is making to achieve his goals and aspirations. In the event that someone sees his hair falling out when touching it, this may be a sign of anxiety that the dreamer is trying to get rid of. Seeing hair falling out when touching it in a dream may indicate unhappy events that the dreamer may experience At that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about worms falling out of the hair in a dream. Worms falling out of the hair in a dream may mean the sadness that the dreamer is experiencing at that moment, and God knows best. Whoever saw in a dream that worms were falling out of his head, it may indicate his sadness when The dreamer encounters those days, and God knows best. If he sees in his dream worms coming out of his head, this may indicate that he is trying to achieve goals and ambitions during those days. Whoever dreams of worms coming out of his hair may indicate the dreamer’s need to achieve his goals and aspirations at that time, and God knows best. I know. Interpretation of a dream about the stairs falling in the house in a dream. Falling down the stairs in the house in a dream may indicate some sorrows that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. Anyone who sees in his dream that the stairs fell in the dream, it could be a sign of sadness while the dreamer is facing in That time. In the event that one sees that the stairs have fallen inside the house, this may indicate some problems and crises that the dreamer faced in those days and needs to repent and rely on God. Descending the stairs in a dream may indicate financial problems that the dreamer may face in his life. At that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a falling toilet in a dream: A falling toilet in a dream may indicate the fears and sorrows of the dreamer that he was facing in his life at that time. Anyone who dreams that his toilet has fallen may indicate a difficult period is going through The dreamer has it in his life

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a child in a dream: Seeing a child in a dream has different meanings. We find that seeing a male child is not the same as a female child, but it does not express a bad meaning for the dreamer. It is known that children have an innocence that no one else possesses, so seeing them can be like that. A warning about an important issue that we will explain in this detailed article. What is the interpretation of a dream about a child? Seeing a child in a dream foretells the dreamer’s blessing in his life and that he will see the best and most beautiful in his next life, and it can also be a sign that some happy and good news is coming to him. If it is an infant, This indicates the need to pay attention to all his upcoming work in order to move forward and progress, and the vision that expresses his full responsibility towards his family, as he has the ability to do so. If the child has a beautiful and organized body, then he expresses the arrival of joy and happiness to the viewer in a wonderful way, but if he Its appearance is strange and not beautiful, this leads to hearing unpleasant news and experiencing some troubles and worries. . If the dreamer sees him during his death, this leads to some diseases or problems that make him sad for some time and affect him psychologically. The vision shows the amount of comfort that appears to the dreamer, and his Lord will bestow upon him vast and unending favor, so he will always praise and thank his Lord. So increase it. The dream can be an expression About the effort made to achieve an important goal. Raising children brings difficulties and problems in reality, so we find that it refers to this in the dream. The vision may lead to exposure to some diseases that he gets rid of immediately, but he must be patient with them and not be afraid of them, so that God will give him His bounty and compensates him with goodness. What is the interpretation of a dream about a child by Ibn Sirin? The vision is an explanation that his life is going as he wants and that he is walking on the path of righteousness and repentance to his Lord. Imam Ibn Sirin explains to us that seeing a male child prompts him to live his life amid worries and sorrow, but as for a child, seeing him It expresses happiness and pleasure. His vision of a pregnant woman is confirmation of her wonderful and easy birth, and that she will give birth to a boy, even if her vision of a male child conflicts with her status as a girl. His crying in a dream is an expression of the problems that the dreamer is exposed to and he is doing his best to get rid of them and overcome his crises. Perhaps it indicates The vision indicates a happy change in the dreamer’s life and an escape from all the problems he is going through without feeling distress and remorse. If the dreamer complains of pain or fatigue, then this dream is good news for getting rid of all problems and sorrows and that God (Glory be to Him) will honor him with a lot of wealth and children so that he will feel satisfied. Complete. This vision is a sign that he enjoys peace and comfort in life and is not exposed to any anxiety or crisis that could exhaust him or bother him. What is the interpretation of a dream about a child in your arms by Ibn Sirin? The vision indicates the arrival of an important desire that he has desired for a long time, so the vision makes him happy with its imminent fulfillment and his happiness with it. Seeing a child in a dream represents getting rid of all the fears that he is currently experiencing. If he is imprisoned for any purpose, God will soon relieve him of his distress. When you dream of this dream, it means...

title: Interpretation of seeing insects in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing insects in a dream in detail, as through our article we will learn about the meanings of a dream about insects in a dream, as it indicates family problems or fatigue and illness, and sometimes it indicates a large number of sins and sometimes it indicates the death of sadness and comfort. Interpretation of a dream about seeing insects in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing insects in Bed in a dream: This indicates family and marital problems. Seeing insects on the body announces many sins and transgressions. Seeing insects in a dream indicates anxiety and sorrows and may indicate illness. What is the interpretation of seeing insects in a dream for a man? If one sees that the house is full of insects, this indicates many From marital problems, with children or family problems. Seeing an insect bite in a man’s dream indicates disturbances in professional and social life and the machinations of friends. What is the interpretation of seeing insects in a dream for a single woman? If a girl sees that she has been bitten by an insect, it indicates the presence of a deceitful person in her life. It harms her and harms her. If a girl sees that she is getting rid of insects by killing them or exterminating them with an insecticide, it means getting rid of enemies, the death of sadness and anxiety, and achieving what is desired in the near future. If a girl sees that an insect has bitten her severely, it indicates that she will be exposed to an engagement that will not last long and may cause her psychological pain. What is the interpretation of seeing insects in a dream for a married woman? The presence of insects in a dream for a married woman indicates many problems and troubles in her life. If a married woman sees that she is killing insects or running away from them, this may indicate that she has passed the difficult stages and that she has overcome the problems. What is the interpretation of seeing insects in a dream? A dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing insects in a pregnant woman’s dream may not be well and shows the mother’s problems and fears during pregnancy and childbirth. She may get tired during childbirth. Likewise, insects indicate the presence of envy and hatred in her life. Seeing insects escaping or killing them with pesticides in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease of childbirth and their disappearance. Danger. What is the interpretation of seeing insects in a dream for a divorced woman or a widow? If a divorced woman or a widow sees insects invading her home, this shows the obstacles she faces and the challenges you face. If you escape from the insects, you will overcome these obstacles and your worries and problems will go away. Seeing bed bugs in a dream for a divorced woman or a widow, this indicates A lot of trouble and suffering, loneliness and sadness. What is the interpretation of a dream about small insects? Seeing yourself killing a cockroach in a dream indicates getting rid of envy. Seeing ants in a dream indicates fatigue and exhaustion. Seeing a spider in the house It indicates many quarrels and family quarrels. Seeing small insects In a married man’s dream, simple problems and disagreements appear that can be resolved. What is the interpretation of seeing insects on the body in a dream? Seeing insects coming out of the ear indicates that he hears false words. Seeing them killing flies may indicate renunciation of evil and harm. What is the interpretation of a dream of flying insects in a dream? Seeing insects crawling in the The dream of an unmarried young man indicates his marriage to a woman with bad morals. Seeing insects

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing an elephant in a dream

preview.html: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing an elephant in a dream are symbols whose interpretation varies. An elephant in a dream indicates a cursed person, as seeing an elephant means the cruelest of kings and leaders. He eats, and this is what we will explain in this article. What is the interpretation of seeing an elephant running away in a dream? Evidence of achieving goals and the ability to achieve what can be achieved. The interpretation of seeing an elephant riding in a dream? It indicates the great position that God will have in his work. What is the interpretation of a man? Who sees himself hitting an elephant in a dream? An indication of many livelihoods. Interpretation of seeing a small elephant in a dream? Details of this girl’s engagement in the near future. What is the interpretation of seeing a white elephant in a married woman’s dream? Details of pregnancy soon. Interpretation of a dream about an elephant in a dreamSeeing yourself Escaping from an elephant in a dream is evidence of achieving goals and the ability to emerge. After that, if one sees in a dream that he is escaping from a white elephant, this indicates that he is a person who refuses to marry. Seeing an elephant in the house is evidence that one of the members of the house will perform Hajj. Then, seeing an elephant riding in a dream indicates the great status that the fortuneteller will achieve in his work. The elephant appearing in the kitchen opens the doors of food and kindness. After that, seeing the elephant in the garden means that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better and his life will be full of happiness. Whoever sees the elephant hits him. With rubber in a dream he will earn a great livelihood. Seeing a dream about an elephant in a dream for a manIf a man sees that he is hitting an elephant in a dream, this is an indication that he will get a lot of food. If a man talks to an elephant in a dream, he will be exposed to a person of high status. After that, the Seeing an elephant milking in a dream is evidence of the lawful money he will obtain after exhaustion and effort. An elephant in a man’s dream means kindness, blessing, and livelihood. After that, seeing an elephant riding in a dream indicates the prestigious position he will reach at work. Interpretation of a small elephant in a dream for a woman Single woman: Seeing an elephant in one’s dream is a sign of kindness and the dream boy that she will marry soon. After that, seeing a small elephant in a dream is evidence of this girl’s engagement in the near future. Seeing a dream about a white elephant for a married woman. An elephant in a married woman’s dream indicates a change in her life For the better and better and getting rid of any problems. So, seeing a white elephant in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy soon. Seeing a pink elephant is evidence of her husband’s intense love for her. Then seeing a small elephant is evidence of good children who excel in their studies. A sleeping elephant in a dream A married woman is evidence of a feeling of happiness and joy. Hence, seeing a dead elephant in a married woman’s dream is evidence of illness. Interpretation of a dream about an elephant for a pregnant woman: An elephant in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the health of the male child who will have a high status in society. Then to see a baby elephant in a dream Bearer is evidence of the blessings and kindness that the people of the house will receive.
